title: 1928 Block Brothers, St. Louis Cardinals PC - SOLD
author: Beatles Guy

posts.post_title: 1928 Block Brothers, St. Louis Cardinals PC - SOLD
posts.post_content:
No creases, nice gloss.  The sides are slightly curled. Asking $50.00 dlvd.  Paypal preferred.
